title: Recorder app doesn't record anything
content:
The November 24, 2020 update broke the Recorder app. I am using a Pixel 5 and it  doesn't record anymore. 

It has microphone permissions, and I cleared data but when I try to record there's no input at all. It looks like it's recording and will save the file but there's nothing recorded. 

To fix, I uninstalled the app from the Play Store, which put back the original version, and recording works fine again.
